attributes.title: THIS APP MADE ME HATE MYSELF
attributes.review: Took soooo long to download, and when it downloaded it just immediately crashed. I don’t think my phone can handle all the crap in that app. Would NEVER recommend for anyone. Waste of time and storage.

attributes.title: FAKE
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. Worst app in the history of apps, and I know apps because I have many, many apps that I have. I am absolutely positive that I want to leave a negative review, so this is a negative review that is positively negative.

attributes.title: ANGRY CITIZEN
attributes.review: I opened this app and it started yelling racial slurs at me now I understand the narrative this man gives out but I wouldn't have ever expected he'd straight up hack into my camera and call me a tree swinging monkey. Not the best app really has traumatized me I will be contacting my lawyers.

attributes.title: Chinese Spyware!
attributes.review: Do not download this app! This app is not what you think it is, it’s made by the Chinese communist government to steal YOUR identity and everything  you own. If you care about your safety and well being do NOT download this app!!

attributes.title: Why did you even make this 🍊
attributes.review: This is a stupidest app on the App Store would not recommend to anyone trying too download idk why anyone would make such a stupid app cause they are just wasting there time.I HATE THIS APP.

Let’s see umm u built a wall called Mexico pepol rasct and that they don’t work hard and umm u wen to a church and got a bible and we read bibles we don’t hold them  and u coud haved stop ice but u didn’t and I know Obama bulit the cages but they didn’t put kids in them stupid

attributes.title: BLM
attributes.review: This app is horrible! It glitches all the time and shows a horrifying graphic and gory image of a guy with corn like hair and his face looks like it was smeared in Cheeto dust. This app made the beetles from under my bed crawl into my pants at night and baby spiders were hatched in my booty.

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼Disgusting 🧚🏼✨
attributes.review: Made my phone glitch👁👄👁 took an hour to download. Mr. Cheeto man didn’t make a good app ✨🥴😔🥴 ✨in fact I think this app is even worse than his presidency ✨🤭🙃🤭✨ actually, just kidding- there is nothing worse than that✨💕🤢💕✨.

attributes.title: ⏰ hehe
attributes.review: This app was ✨horrible✨ and it was ridiculous because I was looking so forward on using it but now it’s just a waste of my time I could’ve walked my pet goldfish but no I wasted my time on this horrible app THANKS A LOT.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I tried to download it, but it took hours to download and it started  playing music and when downloading it did not let me open any of my other apps
